sen.j: この間、寺社奉行、京都所司代、老中などの重職を歴任し、1万石の加増も得た。
sen.e: During these 45 years, he held the important posts in succession such as jisha-bugyou (the chief of the temple-shrine police), Kyoto-shoshidai (the office handling affairs concerning the Imperial Court and Kinki Region), and roju (the person in charge of politics directly under shogun), and he obtained an addition 10,000 [koku] (an amount of rice which can feed 10,000 people for one year) to his salary.

During his reign, he held the important posts in succession such as jisha-bugyo (magistrate of temples and shrines), Kyoto shoshidai (Kyoto deputy), and roju (senior councilor), and he obtained additional 10,000 koku (approximately 1.8 million liters of crop yield) to his salary.
